name: Die Hard!
description:
In this fast-paced platformer, the goal is to finish each level as fast as possible. But, chance may not be your friend. Use level 0 as the tutorial to explain the mechanics of the game, and enjoy!

If you enjoyed this game, PLEASE go show support to my team, Fullscreen Productions, and the helpers. Shoutouts!

Dry - Soundtrack

TheRealJeryn - Art
